amendment.description: To provide an exception to the additional tax under section 72(t) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 for distributions to activated reservists or guardsmen, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4061 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4061 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S11222) To provide an exception to the additional tax under section 72(t) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 for distributions to activated reservists or guardsmen, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4061 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4061 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
